code: import{useEffect}from"react";var useOutsideClick=function useOutsideClick(ref,callback){var handleClick=function handleClick(e){if(ref.current&&!ref.current.contains(e.target)){callback();}};useEffect(function(){document.addEventListener("click",handleClick);return function(){document.removeEventListener("click",handleClick);};});};export default useOutsideClick;
